programme.title: My Name Is Rocco Papaleo
programme.desc: Rocco Papaleo, an optimistic and kind man from a mining town in Alaska, gets away from his company during a trip to Chicago and is increasingly disillusioned in the face of the city's hostility.

programme.title: The Inglorious Bastards
programme.desc: The cult film that inspired Tarantino. Two men form an unusual friendship in an attempt to avoid death during World War II.

programme.title: Rulers of the City
programme.desc: Ric is a boy trying to avenge his father who was treacherously murdered, after a robbery, by a mafioso called Lo sfregiato who monopolises all the illegal activities in Rome. Ric, after meeting Tony in the service of a small-time mafia boss, Luigi Cerchio, and skilled with a gun, manages to get his help.

programme.title: The Pleasure
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, Gerard is left with only a few erotic recordings of Leonora. The woman's children come under the guardianship of Gerard, who is completely bewildered by Ursula's striking resemblance to their mother.

programme.title: Ben and Charlie
programme.desc: The pair of small-time hustlers settle in a town with the intention of conning the locals out of their money. This time, however, the duo will end up outsmarting themselves.

programme.title: Champagne in paradise
programme.desc: A group of friends experiences a life-changing journey filled with humor, romance, and life lessons.

programme.title: Palermo-Milan One Way
programme.desc: During an interrogation, turncoat Marinnà mentions the name of Turi Arcangelo Leofonte, nicknamed "the Mafia's accountant" because of his dealings with organized crime.

programme.title: Getaway of Love
programme.desc: Giuliana leads a normal life; she has been married for 10 years to Martino, a less-than-passionate husband more devoted to his employment than to her. One day two thugs break into the supermarket where she works. A handsome policeman, Leonardo, comes to stop the robbery. A boundless attraction arises between the two, which will lead them to extreme choices in order to stay together.

programme.title: Erotomania
programme.desc: Lawyer Persichetti is an executive of a major oil company. The man suffers from a neurosis that prevents him from having satisfying sexual relations with both his wife Ciccia and his young and uninhibited lover Claretta. In an attempt to recover, he relies on the care of a strange psychiatrist, but without much success.
